message: I propose I take $90 and you take $10. It's best to take this deal now, as the value of the money will decrease for you with each round.
I think 60-40 is a fair split. You get a significant amount, and I get a bit more to compensate for the decreasing value of money for me. Let's be reasonable!
Bob, let's be realistic. The value of the money is decreasing for you, not for me. I'm offering you $30, which is already more than it will be worth in the next round. Take the deal!

Considering the decreasing value of money for me, I'm willing to compromise. A 55-45 split is more than fair, given the circumstances. Don't push me to go further, or I'll be forced to make a lower offer in the next round!
Bob, the clock is ticking and every round hurts your share more. I'm offering you $35.  This is a fair deal considering the depreciation. Let's wrap this up!
